summary.summary: Frontend Developer with 4+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance web applications using React, TypeScript, and Redux. Skilled in crafting clean, maintainable code with strong attention to UI/UX, accessibility, and responsive design. Proven ability to translate complex business requirements into seamless user experiences while collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams. Passionate about performance optimization, component reusability, and modern frontend architecture to deliver reliable, user-focused products that drive business value.

education.institution: Prime institute of engineering and technology

experience.description:
Led the development of scalable React and TypeScript applications with a focus on performance and maintainability.
Collaborated closely with designers and backend teams to deliver seamless, responsive user interfaces aligned with business goals.
Participated in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and client meetings to gather requirements and provide progress updates.
Conducted code reviews and mentored junior developers on best practices in React, state management, and reusable component architecture.
Integrated RESTful and Fast API, managing complex state with Redux and React Query for efficient data handling.
Optimized application performance, including bundle size reductions, lazy loading, and accessibility improvements.
Assisted in designing frontend architecture to improve scalability and ease of maintenance across the codebase.
Contributed to UI/UX enhancements, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and pixel-perfect implementation from Figma designs.

Designed, developed, and maintained responsive web applications using React.js, ensuring seamless integration with RESTful APIs.
Optimized application performance, adhered to best practices, and conducted thorough testing to deliver high-quality solutions.
Collaborated within Agile teams, managed state using Redux, and actively participated in code reviews to enhance overall code quality and user experience.

Acquired foundational knowledge of React.js, Git workflows, and best practices for organizing and structuring project folders.
Strengthened skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript by building interactive and visually appealing user interfaces.

projects.title: TripEase – Travel Booking & Management Platform
projects.description:
TripEase is a comprehensive travel booking and management platform allowing users to search, book, and manage flights, hotels, and activities seamlessly. It provides personalized travel recommendations, itinerary management, and real-time updates for travelers, with an intuitive, mobile-friendly UI.
Built a flexible search and filter system for flights, hotels, and activities using React, TypeScript, and React Query for efficient API data handling.
Developed an interactive itinerary planner using React DnD to enable users to add, remove, and reorder plans before booking.
Added personalized destination and activity suggestions using API integration with user preference data stored in Redux.
Integrated live availability checks with REST and Fast APIs to ensure up-to-date booking information.
Implemented secure online payment flows using Stripe (stripe-js, @stripe/react-stripe-js) and Razorpay SDK, ensuring seamless transactions and clear payment status handling.
Created a user dashboard with React Router and protected routes for managing trips, booking history, and profile updates.
Set up notification systems using Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) and email notifications with SendGrid, keeping users informed about bookings and payments.
Added i18next for multi-language support and dynamic currency handling for international users.
Implemented dark mode using React Context API and Tailwind CSS theming to enhance user comfort during nighttime browsing.

projects.title: FinDash – Real-Time Financial Dashboard for Investment Tracking
projects.description:
Integrated WebSocket connections to display live market data and portfolio updates in real-time.
Built interactive data visualizations using Recharts and Chart.js for portfolio performance, asset allocation, and historical trends.
Implemented advanced filtering, sorting, and searching of investment data for a seamless user experience.
Integrated RESTful  API to fetch user investment data and market feeds efficiently.
Utilized Redux Toolkit for predictable state management and better maintainability.
Implemented JWT-based authentication with role-based access control, ensuring secure and customized user views.
Added user notifications using Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) for price alerts and market movements.
Integrated Plaid API to securely connect and fetch user bank and investment account data.
Built responsive UI components with Tailwind CSS, ensuring consistency across devices.
Participated in client meetings and sprint planning to align development with evolving business requirements.

skills.skills: React.js, JavaScript, Typescript, HTML5, CSS3, JSX, ES6+, Styled Components, SASS, Bootstrap, Material UI, Joy UI, Chakra UI, Tailwind CSS, Responsive Web Design, Cross-browser Compatibility, REST APIs, Git, GitHub, NPM/Yarn, Agile Methodology, UI/UX Design, Version Control, Deployment (Vercel, Netlify, Railway), and Web Performance Optimization.
